Title: Battlefront: Plastic Bases - Rural
Body (HTML):
The new plastic rural bases make basing an infantry army for Flames Of War a breeze. The new bases are ideal for any force fighting in Europe (or anywhere else with dirt and trees!). The Studio team have been looking forward to the release of these bases for a very long time and are excited to add another set of pre-sculpted bases to the range.

Frame A of the plastic rural bases contains the majority of the bases and has two distinct themes. There are also a number of different style plugs to use in case you want fill in some of the figure recesses on a base depending your basing needs i.e. number of figures on a base or if you want to use a specific base for a specific purpose.

Frame B contains bases and accessories that give you even more flexibility for basing your force. It includes bases with figure recesses for prone infantry figures and plenty of different plugs that allow you to personalize your infantry bases however you like. Accessories such as tree stumps and fences will allow you infantry bases to really stand out on the table.

Title: Battlefront: Plastic Bases - Rubble
Body (HTML): Contains 12 small and 16 medium bases, individually sculpted and themed.

Title: Gale Force Nine - 10-Piece Detail File Set
Body (HTML): This file set is perfect for anyone needing to make their miniatures perfect. This 10-piece set almost guarantees that you will find exactly what you need for your next filing project.

Title: Gale Force Nine - Hobby Knife
Body (HTML): This high-quality hobby knife, emblazoned with the Gale Force Nine logo is perfect for all of your hobby needs. Whether its cleaning mould lines or cutting plastic bits, this hobby knife will do the job! Includes five extra blades.

Title: Gale Force Nine - Tape Measurer
Body (HTML): Gale Force Nine’s hobby tool range provides the miniature modeler, collector and gamer with all of the indispensable tools and supplies needed for every project.<br data-mce-fragment="1"><br data-mce-fragment="1">From basic assembly and cleaning of your new miniatures to master level conversions, our range has the tool that’s right for you! Never before has a hobby tool range combined such versatility, quality and affordable prices.<br data-mce-fragment="1"><br data-mce-fragment="1">The GF9 measuring tape has both metric and imperial measures and is contoured for ultimate comfort in the hand.

Title: Gale Force Nine: Sculpting Tools - Introductory
Body (HTML): This set is great for the beginning sculptor. Wither its filling gaps while assembling your model or sculpting a new addition to your miniature, you'll find the right tool for the job in this affordable set. This set contains three stainless steel tools.

Title: Gale Force Nine - Precision Sidecutter (Flush Cutter)
Body (HTML): These precision cutters are strong enough to cut a metal model in two. Perfect for quick conversion work or cutting parts off the sprue.

Title: Gale Force Nine - Plastic Sidecutter (Flush cutter)
Body (HTML): These durable flush cutter's are perfect for clipping plastic model parts off the sprue or cutting unwanted plastic bits off your miniature.

Title: Gale Force Nine: Hobby Round - Three Strand Rope
Body (HTML): The use of ropes dates back to prehistoric times, and is still in use today. No matter what time period your wargaming is taking place, whether it’s on sea or land, you’re bound to find a use for these lengths of rope.

Title: Gale Force Nine: Hobby Round - Braided Iron Cable
Body (HTML):
Great for use as electrical cable, power conduits, road construction or other similar scenery or decoration item in any 15-30mm scale miniatures diorama or on a similar scale figure model or base.

Contains 2 metres / 6 feet of 1.0mm Braided Iron Cable.

Title: Gale Force Nine: Hobby Round - Snake Chain
Body (HTML): Contains 2 meters / 6 feet of 1.5mm Snake Chain.

Title: Gale Force Nine: Hobby Round - Bocage Flock Blend
Body (HTML): The Hobby Scenics Range offers everything the miniature hobbyist/gamer needs to finish and detail their models. It provides a palette of flocks, static grasses, basing grits and other materials that allow hobbyists to take their projects to the next level and make every base a mini diorama! The range is packaged in “Hobby Rounds” which are clear, puck shaped containers that are the perfect size for the miniature hobbyists’ tool box and even stack for convenience. Each Hobby Round contains approximately 58 Cubic Centimeters of material.

Title: Gale Force Nine: Hobby Round - Arid Static Grass
Body (HTML): The grass isn't always greener on the other side... Gale Force 9's new Arid Static Grass blend is perfect of all those dead, dried out, war-torn places where battles are so often fought. Deserts, scrub lands, and abandoned urban lots all look great with a few patches of yellowed, dried out grass. You can also use Arid Static Grass alongside autumn foliage for great early winter bases, snow for winter scenics, or green foliage for early spring bases.

Title: Gale Force Nine: Hobby Round - Winter/Dead Static Grass
Body (HTML): Gale Force Nine Winter/Dead Static Grass is a mixture of colors that realistically represents dead, dying, or dried out grass. Winter/Dead Static Grass is a great option for armies that are dead or dying themselves! If you want your bases to look great, but not draw too much attention away from your models, the subtle colors of Winter/Dead Static grass are a great option. Winter/Dead static grass also works for urban weeds, swamp grasses or winter ground cover.

Title: Gale Force Nine: Hobby Round - Parched Straw Static Grass
Body (HTML): Not all battles are fought on the green fields of summer. Gale Force Nine’s Parched Straw Static Grass Blend gives you an option to represent dry, cold, or arid climates. This golden static grass is blended with a dash of tan flock and fine mustard flock, for a basing material that has great texture and color. Parched Straw Blend is terrific for represented autumn fields, beachfront scrub grasses, or drought scorched farmland.

Title: Gale Force Nine: Epoxy Sealant Putty - "Green Stuff"
Body (HTML):
Green Stuff Epoxy Sealant Adhesive Putty 3.5 oz. Gale Force Nine 100g of "Green Stuff" Sculpting Epoxy. Miniature figure sculptors and modelers use Kneadatite Blue/Yellow, which they have nicknamed "Green", for a number of specific uses:

- To fashion the models used to make the molds for miniature pewter figures.

- To fill gaps that appear in "built-up" kits.

- To customize pieces with added parts not included in model kits.

- To make original sculptures.

Kneadatite is a room-temperature curing epoxy/polyamide sealant in two-part tape form. It is stable in its packaged form consisting of base and curing agent side by side on release film. The base and curing agent are of contrasting colors so that when kneaded together, complete mixing is easily observed. Its adhesive properties allow the artist to add detail gradually, before or after the previously applied Kneadatite has fully hardened.

It has excellent adhesion to stone, ceramic, metal, wood, and many plastics including vinyl. When fully hardened, it can be painted, sanded, filed, drilled, tapped, screwed, etc.

Kneadatite's features and benefits make it the best product available for sculptors and modelers:

- Extremely smooth, non-grainy texture.

- Long work life (1-1/2 to 2 hrs.).

- Ability to hold fine detail.

- Adheres well to almost any surface.

- Has slightly flexibility after cure so it doesn't snap under stress

- Withstands high heat (325 F) and up to 2,000 pounds of pressure during the mold making process.

- Withstands up to four vulcanizations.

Title: Gale Force Nine - Plastic Glue
Body (HTML):
Plastic glue instantly makes a bond between any two plastic parts. Ideal for any plastic model assembly. With the precision nozzle of this pot, it is very easy to apply small dots of plastic glue without running and thus ruining the details on the miniature. The viscosity of the glue has been designed specifically with wargaming miniatures in mind. It bonds light within seconds so no extra handling/correction is needed once the pieces are together, increasing your speed and precision.

The bottle contains 24gm of Polystyrene Cement.

Title: Gale Force Nine: Super Glue - Rapid Cure
Body (HTML):
If you have never tried a Superglue Rapid Cure - you are in for the biggest surprise in your
Hobby career! Ever tried to sit for endless hours trying to glue to micro pieces of metal
together, or two really large parts? That is all history now: Rapid Cure will instantly dry &
harden superglue with only 1 dose - directly onto the glue and the parts you try to assemble.
Once you have tried gluing with this you will never go back to "normal" time consuming
gluing. This is a top quality product used by Dentists worldwide. It comes with a handy
brush applicator for precise application.

The bottle contains 10gm of Rapid Cure.

Title: Colours of War - Paint Brush set
Body (HTML):
Three brushes:

  • Small Brush
  • Medium Brush
  • Small Drybrush

Title: Star Wars X-Wing: Double-Sided Gaming Mat - Asteroid Field/Space Station
Body (HTML):
Double sided Asteroid Field / Space Station space gaming mat in an
epic size, perfect for all your gaming needs, made out of flexible
neoprene.

36in X 36in

Title: Waterdeep Dragon Heist: Collector's Series - Laeriel Silverhand
Body (HTML):
To complement the upcoming Dungeons and Dragons™ Dragon Heist book, Gale Force Nine are releasing a new set of Collector’s Series miniatures.

This Laeriel Silverhand miniature allows you to bring the adventure to life on your tabletop and will only be available for a short time.

Title: Team Yankee: Leopard - West Germans in World War III
Body (HTML):
Leopard – West Germans in World War III is the first supplement for Team Yankee, the World War III miniatures game. It introduces the forces of West Germany to the turbulent battlefields of World War III in 1985. Leopard and the West German range of Team Yankee models include everything you need to hold back the Red Menace.

Inside you will find background on the West German Bundeswehr (armed forces) and Heer (army) and their role in the initial stages of World War III. You will also find the stories of Panzer Division 1 and Kampfgruppe Müller as they fight to defend their country form the invading communist forces.

Title: Team Yankee: Iron Maiden - British Army in World War III
Body (HTML):
When World War III broke out in August 1985, the British Army Of the Rhine (BAOR) had been defending the West on the border between West Germany and East Germany for just over 40 years. These soldiers, the third generation of British soldiers to stand watch on the North German Plain, quickly proved their mettle. With the release of Iron Maiden, the British are coming to Team Yankee.

Iron Maiden covers the British Army Of the Rhine and features four different formations that you can field:

The Death or Glory Boys (or 17th/21st Lancers) bring the might of the Chieftain tank, with up to 14 per formation.
Supported by Swingfire anti-tank guided missile armed vehicles, as well as a recce troop of Scorpions, Abbot field artillery and a platoon of mechanised infantry each Chieftain Armoured Squadron is more than capable of defending the line against the Soviets.
What the tanks seize, the infantry hold. And the men of the Irish Guards are no strangers to difficult missions, having faced the Germans in World War II and now the tide of Soviets 40 years later. Each mechanised company is based around three platoons of infantry transported in FV432 personal carriers. They bring their own mortar carriers, mobile Spartan Milan launchers as well as infantry Milan teams. Like the tanks, they can expect support from Chieftains, artillery and Scimitar recce troops.

Title: Team Yankee: Rulebook - World War III (2017 Edition)
Body (HTML):
The latest two army books, Stripes and Red Thunder have greatly improved the range of options available to US and Soviet players to the point where the old lists included in the original printing were out of date. So they have replaced those with Force Diagrams for all five nations currently in Team Yankee, as well as a miniature catalogue of all the models currently in our range.

These new Force Diagrams will make it much easier for new players to work out which nation they would like to field, as well as helping them to plan out the first armies. Because all Team Yankee models come with the appropriate Unit Cards these you can even start building a new army without buying the appropriate Army Book if you desire.

Title: Team Yankee: Free Nations - Hardback
Body (HTML): The world of Team Yankee continues to expand, and this book adds four more nations to the roster of forces with which to play. Free Nations started as an idea to add some of the forces of the smaller NATO nations, but grew into something much bigger with four western nations covered (well, technically five if you choose to run your ANZACs as New Zealanders). Wayne looks at Free Nations and all the different nations in the book.

Title: Team Yankee: Soviet - BMP-1/BMP-2 Company
Body (HTML):
The BMP-1 is a Soviet amphibious tracked infantry fighting vehicle. BMP stands for Boyevaya Mashina Pekhoty 1, meaning "infantry fighting vehicle".

The BMP-1 was the first mass-produced infantry fighting vehicle (IFV) of USSR. Based on lessons learned from early experiences in the Soviet War in Afghanistan, a version with improved fighting qualities was developed, called the BMP-2. It was accepted into service in August 1980.

Includes five plastic BMP-1 or 2 transports, Decal Sheet and Crew

Title: Team Yankee: World War III Miniatures Games - Mechanised Platoon
Body (HTML):
Includes four GPMG teams with 66mm anti-tank, three Carl Gustav anti-tank teams, one 2" mortar team one Small two-hole base, seven Medium four-hole bases & three Unit cards.

As the FV432 armored personnel carrier was designed to carry a full section of infantry, the mechanized platoon mirrors the organisation of the standard rifle platoon with a HQ section and three rifle sections.

Title: Team Yankee: Oil War - World War III in the Middle East (Army Book)
Body (HTML):
With Europe ablaze the shadow of war quickly crept across the globe. In the Middle East, Iran and Iraq had been locked in a conflict across their border since 1980, and looked unlikely to stop anytime soon.  Further west, Israel and Syria had come to blows in Lebanon as Israel fought PLO forces operating from inside their northern neighbour. The oil rich region, already rife with conflict and tension, was about to be drawn into World War III as the Soviet Union and US led NATO set about protecting their interests in the black gold that kept the wheels of industry turning.

Oil War includes information on World War III in the Middle East, covering Israel, Iraq, Syria and Iran in Team Yankee.

Title: Team Yankee: World War III - American Rulebook
Body (HTML): Inside the 108pg Hardback World War III: American book you will find: Background on the US 5th and 7th Corps, 1st Armored Division, Combat Team Alpha, 82nd Airborne Division, 9th Motorised Division, and the 2nd Marine Division. Instructions on how to build a variety of different Formations, three Scenarios to test your skills and a detailed painting guide to help you prepare your US troops for combat.

Title: Team Yankee: World War III - Soviet Rulebook
Body (HTML): Inside you will find: Background on the Group of Soviet Forces in Germany, 2nd Guards Tank Army, 94th Guards Motor Rifle Division, 7th Guards Tank Division, 18th Guards Motor Rifle Division, and Yuri Volkov’s Tank Battalion. Instructions on how to build a T-80 Tank Battalion, T-64 Tank Battalion, T-72 Tank Battalion, T-62M Tank Battalion, T-55AM Tank Battalion, BMP Motor Rifle Battalion, BTR-60 Motor Rifle Battalion, Afgantsy Air Assault Battalion, or a T-80 Shock Tank Company. Three Scenarios to test your skills with your Soviet force.

Title: Gale Force Nine: Hobby Round - Marsh Blend
Body (HTML): Marsh Blend is a mix of flocks and static grasses that represent the mossy, murky, plants that live in damp, fetid places. Marsh Blend works well for armies that make their home in bogs, swamps and other dark places. Marsh Blend looks really good alongside Winter/Dead Static Grass.
